about_the_game:
"Home Wars: Battlefield" is the long-awaited spin-off of the "Home Wars" video game.

In this title, the player will experience the Home Wars universe exclusively from a first/third-person perspective, temporarily abandoning the strategic aspect of its predecessor.

What is "Home Wars: Battlefield"?

It is a highly cooperative PvE multiplayer shooter in first/third person.

Here, strategy has given way to tactics and the courage of individual soldiers!

What are the factions of "Home Wars: Battlefield"?

There are 3 factions: Army, Insects and Dinosaurs.

The first two were also in the first title, while Dinosaurs are the new faction.

Why dinosaurs? We all had at least one small plastic dinosaur in our childhood ... and on top of that, dinosaurs are always super cool!

What characterizes "Home Wars: Battlefield"?

Finally, as you requested, in Home Wars, the player will be able to play as both soldiers and insects, and in this case, also dinosaurs.

Another thing that you have loudly requested is the possibility of playing with your friends.

Competitive multiplayer video games are great, but in my opinion cooperative games are a cut above, both in terms of fun and social function.

Have fun fortifying a point of interest with a friend and defending it with your allied bots.

An unlock tree will allow you to unlock better equipment gradually using the resources earned in battle.

No microtransactions! No shortcuts! Here, to advance, you have to play!

What differentiates the 3 factions? What type of gameplay will they have?

They will have 3 profoundly different gameplays.

The Army will have the most destructive and versatile weapons but also the most expensive, so you will likely find yourself in physical and numerical inferiority. You can call on the battlefield a wide variety of vehicles, including static defenses, light vehicles, tanks, artillery, planes, helicopters, ships, submarines, and mechs!

The insects will be the most agile and fastest faction and the only ones that can use poison. Some units of this faction are perfect for quickly attacking the enemy, perhaps from the blind side, while other units, larger and more armored, allow for a more direct and terrifying engagement.

The Dinosaurs are the heaviest faction in the game. Many are giants designed directly by Mother Nature, who made them walking death machines. Here, you will see giants of flesh that are difficult to take down and speedy creatures perfect for attacking the enemy from the flanks.

Main features of "Home Wars: Battlefield":

  • Hundreds of bots on the screen, both allies and enemies!

  • Play as your beloved toy soldiers again in first-person or third-person.

  • Fight alone or with your friends or strangers around the Earth who share your cause.

  • Fight as a toy soldier, a bug, or a dinosaur.

  • Each faction can fight against every other faction (so yes, even Army vs Army!).

  • Highly cooperative PvE with innovative mechanics that favor even more team play.

  • Dozens of vehicles can be called on the battlefield: static defenses, transport vehicles, light vehicles, tanks, behemoths, mechs, artillery, transport helicopters, attack helicopters, fighters, bombers, torpedo bombers, gunboats, speedboats, destroyers, cruisers, battleships, strategic submarines, hunter-killer submarines and more.

  • Fortify the points you want and how you want, using various static defenses.

  • Field and home battlefields.

  • In battle, you earn resources that can then be used to improve your equipment.

  • No microtransactions, finally!

  • Units are divided into classes! (still to be defined).

  • Old school fun, baby! (watch the last screenshot to understand me ;))

  • A cooperative PvE developed by a player who loves playing cooperative PvE and who does not have to answer to any investors except his players! Incredible! It's Sci-fi!

The game is still developing, so come forward with ideas in the Community Hub!

There are no stupid ideas or out-of-place proposals for Insane Dreamers, so don't hesitate to brainstorm with me!

I have been reading every comment and review of my games for years, so rest assured that you will not go unnoticed.

Add "Home Wars: Battlefield" to your wishlist and follow the game's progress in development. I was hoping you could share your opinion with me, and let's create the most cooperative PvE ever!

Also, always remember:

THE ONLY GOOD BUG IS A DEAD BUG!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Fight in an epic first/third-person battlefield with your friends! In this cooperative PvE game, there are 3 factions, all fully playable: Army, Insects, Dinosaurs. Hundreds of allied/enemy bots on screen! Old school fun, baby!
